entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, McBride
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 31 December 2022
